description: Solid Joys is a daily devotional written and read by John Piper. These short and substantive readings will feed your joy in Jesus every day of the year. Discover more from Piper at desiringGod.org.

items.content: God will gladly receive anything from us that shows our dependence and his all-sufficiency. Therefore, we can gladly cast all our anxieties on him.
items.contentSnippet: God will gladly receive anything from us that shows our dependence and his all-sufficiency. Therefore, we can gladly cast all our anxieties on him.
items.creator: John Piper
items.dc:creator: John Piper

itunes.author: John Piper
itunes.keywords: Desiring God, John Piper, Article, The Sovereignty of God, 2 Chronicles 16:9
itunes.subtitle: God will gladly receive anything from us that shows our dependence and his all-sufficiency. Therefore, we can gladly cast all our anxieties on him.
itunes.summary: God will gladly receive anything from us that shows our dependence and his all-sufficiency. Therefore, we can gladly cast all our anxieties on him.

items.title: Don’t Serve God

items.content: The only joy that reflects the worth of God and overflows in God-glorifying love is rooted in true knowledge of God.
items.contentSnippet: The only joy that reflects the worth of God and overflows in God-glorifying love is rooted in true knowledge of God.
items.creator: John Piper
items.dc:creator: John Piper

itunes.author: John Piper
itunes.keywords: Desiring God, John Piper, Article, Christian Hedonism, Nehemiah 8:12
itunes.subtitle: The only joy that reflects the worth of God and overflows in God-glorifying love is rooted in true knowledge of God.
itunes.summary: The only joy that reflects the worth of God and overflows in God-glorifying love is rooted in true knowledge of God.

items.title: Truer Knowledge Brings Greater Joy

items.content: Joy comes from the Holy Spirit, not our own efforts or imagination or family upbringing. Therefore, the call to joy is a call to earnest prayer.
items.contentSnippet: Joy comes from the Holy Spirit, not our own efforts or imagination or family upbringing. Therefore, the call to joy is a call to earnest prayer.
items.creator: John Piper
items.dc:creator: John Piper

itunes.author: John Piper
itunes.keywords: Desiring God, John Piper, Article, Joy, 2 Corinthians 7:4
itunes.subtitle: Joy comes from the Holy Spirit, not our own efforts or imagination or family upbringing. Therefore, the call to joy is a call to earnest prayer.
itunes.summary: Joy comes from the Holy Spirit, not our own efforts or imagination or family upbringing. Therefore, the call to joy is a call to earnest prayer.

items.title: Seven Sources of Joy

items.content: Gratitude looks back to past grace received and feels thankful. Faith looks forward to future grace promised and feels hopeful.
items.contentSnippet: Gratitude looks back to past grace received and feels thankful. Faith looks forward to future grace promised and feels hopeful.
items.creator: John Piper
items.dc:creator: John Piper

itunes.author: John Piper
itunes.keywords: Desiring God, John Piper, Article, The Grace of God, Romans 11:35–36
itunes.subtitle: Gratitude looks back to past grace received and feels thankful. Faith looks forward to future grace promised and feels hopeful.
itunes.summary: Gratitude looks back to past grace received and feels thankful. Faith looks forward to future grace promised and feels hopeful.

items.title: A Dangerous Motive

items.content: Praying for forgiveness should be based not only on an appeal to God’s mercy, but also on an appeal to his justice in crediting the worth of his Son’s obedience.
items.contentSnippet: Praying for forgiveness should be based not only on an appeal to God’s mercy, but also on an appeal to his justice in crediting the worth of his Son’s obedience.
items.creator: John Piper
items.dc:creator: John Piper

itunes.author: John Piper
itunes.keywords: Desiring God, John Piper, Article, Forgiveness, 1 John 1:9
itunes.subtitle: Praying for forgiveness should be based not only on an appeal to God’s mercy, but also on an appeal to his justice in crediting the worth of his Son’s obedience.
itunes.summary: Praying for forgiveness should be based not only on an appeal to God’s mercy, but also on an appeal to his justice in crediting the worth of his Son’s obedience.

items.title: How to Ask Forgiveness

items.content: The goal of everything God takes us through is hope. He wants us to feel unwaveringly hopeful through all tribulations. He wants us to know he loves us.
items.contentSnippet: The goal of everything God takes us through is hope. He wants us to feel unwaveringly hopeful through all tribulations. He wants us to know he loves us.
items.creator: John Piper
items.dc:creator: John Piper

itunes.author: John Piper
itunes.keywords: Desiring God, John Piper, Article, The Love of God, Romans 5:8
itunes.subtitle: The goal of everything God takes us through is hope. He wants us to feel unwaveringly hopeful through all tribulations. He wants us to know he loves us.
itunes.summary: The goal of everything God takes us through is hope. He wants us to feel unwaveringly hopeful through all tribulations. He wants us to know he loves us.

items.title: God Demonstrates His Love

items.content: God requires good works not as the ground of our justification (which is the righteousness of Christ alone), but as an evidence of it.
items.contentSnippet: God requires good works not as the ground of our justification (which is the righteousness of Christ alone), but as an evidence of it.
items.creator: John Piper
items.dc:creator: John Piper

itunes.author: John Piper
itunes.keywords: Desiring God, John Piper, Article, Justification, Isaiah 64:6
itunes.subtitle: God requires good works not as the ground of our justification (which is the righteousness of Christ alone), but as an evidence of it.
itunes.summary: God requires good works not as the ground of our justification (which is the righteousness of Christ alone), but as an evidence of it.

items.title: Dirty Rags No More

items.content: In this life of sin and pain, how shall we fight for joy? Here are fifteen ways.
items.contentSnippet: In this life of sin and pain, how shall we fight for joy? Here are fifteen ways.
items.creator: John Piper
items.dc:creator: John Piper

itunes.author: John Piper
itunes.keywords: Desiring God, John Piper, Article, Joy, Psalm 16:11
itunes.subtitle: In this life of sin and pain, how shall we fight for joy? Here are fifteen ways.
itunes.summary: In this life of sin and pain, how shall we fight for joy? Here are fifteen ways.

items.title: Fifteen Tactics for Joy

items.content: The age of sin and misery and death is almost spent. The day of righteousness and peace and total joy is dawning.
items.contentSnippet: The age of sin and misery and death is almost spent. The day of righteousness and peace and total joy is dawning.
items.creator: John Piper
items.dc:creator: John Piper

itunes.author: John Piper
itunes.keywords: Desiring God, John Piper, Article, The Person of Christ, Romans 13:12
itunes.subtitle: The age of sin and misery and death is almost spent. The day of righteousness and peace and total joy is dawning.
itunes.summary: The age of sin and misery and death is almost spent. The day of righteousness and peace and total joy is dawning.

items.title: The Day Is at Hand

items.content: Our sins are laid on Christ and his righteousness is laid on us. That is the great exchange — and it becomes ours not by works but by faith.
items.contentSnippet: Our sins are laid on Christ and his righteousness is laid on us. That is the great exchange — and it becomes ours not by works but by faith.
items.creator: John Piper
items.dc:creator: John Piper

itunes.author: John Piper
itunes.keywords: Desiring God, John Piper, Article, Justification, Romans 1:16–17
itunes.subtitle: Our sins are laid on Christ and his righteousness is laid on us. That is the great exchange — and it becomes ours not by works but by faith.
itunes.summary: Our sins are laid on Christ and his righteousness is laid on us. That is the great exchange — and it becomes ours not by works but by faith.

items.title: The Great Exchange

items.content: It could not be otherwise but that Christianity be a singing faith. The founder sang. We are a singing people because we are the children of a singing God.
items.contentSnippet: It could not be otherwise but that Christianity be a singing faith. The founder sang. We are a singing people because we are the children of a singing God.
items.creator: John Piper
items.dc:creator: John Piper

itunes.author: John Piper
itunes.keywords: Desiring God, John Piper, Article, Life of Worship, Mark 14:26
itunes.subtitle: It could not be otherwise but that Christianity be a singing faith. The founder sang. We are a singing people because we are the children of a singing God.
itunes.summary: It could not be otherwise but that Christianity be a singing faith. The founder sang. We are a singing people because we are the children of a singing God.

items.title: Children of a Singing God

items.content: When we speak of being a God-centered people, remember, this is because we are joining God in his God-centeredness.
items.contentSnippet: When we speak of being a God-centered people, remember, this is because we are joining God in his God-centeredness.
items.creator: John Piper
items.dc:creator: John Piper

itunes.author: John Piper
itunes.keywords: Desiring God, John Piper, Article, The Glory of God, 1 Samuel 12:22
itunes.subtitle: When we speak of being a God-centered people, remember, this is because we are joining God in his God-centeredness.
itunes.summary: When we speak of being a God-centered people, remember, this is because we are joining God in his God-centeredness.

items.title: You Were Made for God

items.content: The point of Paul’s conversion happening the way it did is to make Christ’s incredible patience vivid for you.
items.contentSnippet: The point of Paul’s conversion happening the way it did is to make Christ’s incredible patience vivid for you.
items.creator: John Piper
items.dc:creator: John Piper

itunes.author: John Piper
itunes.keywords: Desiring God, John Piper, Article, The Grace of God, 1 Timothy 1:16
itunes.subtitle: The point of Paul’s conversion happening the way it did is to make Christ’s incredible patience vivid for you.
itunes.summary: The point of Paul’s conversion happening the way it did is to make Christ’s incredible patience vivid for you.

items.title: Paul’s Salvation Was for You

items.content: When we live by faith, rooted in God’s forgiveness, we are freed from the lingering, paralyzing effects even of shame we deserve to feel.
items.contentSnippet: When we live by faith, rooted in God’s forgiveness, we are freed from the lingering, paralyzing effects even of shame we deserve to feel.
items.creator: John Piper
items.dc:creator: John Piper

itunes.author: John Piper
itunes.keywords: Desiring God, John Piper, Article, Forgiveness, Luke 7:48
itunes.subtitle: When we live by faith, rooted in God’s forgiveness, we are freed from the lingering, paralyzing effects even of shame we deserve to feel.
itunes.summary: When we live by faith, rooted in God’s forgiveness, we are freed from the lingering, paralyzing effects even of shame we deserve to feel.

items.title: The Liberating Power of Forgiveness

items.content: Christians care about all suffering — especially eternal suffering. That’s the greatest danger every city faces.
items.contentSnippet: Christians care about all suffering — especially eternal suffering. That’s the greatest danger every city faces.
items.creator: John Piper
items.dc:creator: John Piper

itunes.author: John Piper
itunes.keywords: Desiring God, John Piper, Article, Urban Ministry, Jeremiah 29:5–7
itunes.subtitle: Christians care about all suffering — especially eternal suffering. That’s the greatest danger every city faces.
itunes.summary: Christians care about all suffering — especially eternal suffering. That’s the greatest danger every city faces.

items.title: Seek Your City’s Good

items.content: Not being afraid shows that you treasure God as your generous Shepherd, Father, and King.
items.contentSnippet: Not being afraid shows that you treasure God as your generous Shepherd, Father, and King.
items.creator: John Piper
items.dc:creator: John Piper

itunes.author: John Piper
itunes.keywords: Desiring God, John Piper, Article, Christian Hedonism, Luke 12:32
itunes.subtitle: Not being afraid shows that you treasure God as your generous Shepherd, Father, and King.
itunes.summary: Not being afraid shows that you treasure God as your generous Shepherd, Father, and King.

items.title: Five Reasons to Be Fearless

items.content: The key to joy is faith in God’s future grace — that is, being satisfied in all that God promises to be for us.
items.contentSnippet: The key to joy is faith in God’s future grace — that is, being satisfied in all that God promises to be for us.
items.creator: John Piper
items.dc:creator: John Piper

itunes.author: John Piper
itunes.keywords: Desiring God, John Piper, Article, Joy, Matthew 5:11–12
itunes.subtitle: The key to joy is faith in God’s future grace — that is, being satisfied in all that God promises to be for us.
itunes.summary: The key to joy is faith in God’s future grace — that is, being satisfied in all that God promises to be for us.

items.title: The Key to Radical Love

items.content: Cherish the goodness of the Lord, fear straying from him, flee from every sin, and take refuge in him.
items.contentSnippet: Cherish the goodness of the Lord, fear straying from him, flee from every sin, and take refuge in him.
items.creator: John Piper
items.dc:creator: John Piper

itunes.summary: Cherish the goodness of the Lord, fear straying from him, flee from every sin, and take refuge in him.

items.title: Afraid to Stray

items.content: This is the gospel: Even though you have sinned greatly, nevertheless there is a future and a hope. Fear not!
items.contentSnippet: This is the gospel: Even though you have sinned greatly, nevertheless there is a future and a hope. Fear not!
items.creator: John Piper
items.dc:creator: John Piper

itunes.keywords: Desiring God, John Piper, Article, Hope, 1 Samuel 12:20–21
itunes.subtitle: This is the gospel: Even though you have sinned greatly, nevertheless there is a future and a hope. Fear not!
itunes.summary: This is the gospel: Even though you have sinned greatly, nevertheless there is a future and a hope. Fear not!

items.title: A Future for Failures

items.content: The One with infinite power in the universe reaches down to personally touch and transform us.
items.contentSnippet: The One with infinite power in the universe reaches down to personally touch and transform us.
items.creator: John Piper
items.dc:creator: John Piper

itunes.author: John Piper
itunes.keywords: Desiring God, John Piper, Article, The Grace of God, 1 Samuel 10:26
itunes.subtitle: The One with infinite power in the universe reaches down to personally touch and transform us.
itunes.summary: The One with infinite power in the universe reaches down to personally touch and transform us.

items.title: God, Touch Our Hearts

items.content: Faith in Christ is not just assenting to what God is for us, but also embracing all that he is for us in Christ.
items.contentSnippet: Faith in Christ is not just assenting to what God is for us, but also embracing all that he is for us in Christ.
items.creator: John Piper
items.dc:creator: John Piper

itunes.summary: Faith in Christ is not just assenting to what God is for us, but also embracing all that he is for us in Christ.

items.title: Embracing Jesus

items.content: We won’t bear tomorrow’s load on today’s resources. Today’s mercies are for today’s troubles. Tomorrow’s mercies are for tomorrow’s troubles.
items.contentSnippet: We won’t bear tomorrow’s load on today’s resources. Today’s mercies are for today’s troubles. Tomorrow’s mercies are for tomorrow’s troubles.
items.creator: John Piper
items.dc:creator: John Piper

itunes.summary: We won’t bear tomorrow’s load on today’s resources. Today’s mercies are for today’s troubles. Tomorrow’s mercies are for tomorrow’s troubles.

items.title: Mercy for Today

items.content: Come to God in prayer, to confess your sins, and to accept, as needy little farmyard chicks, the direction of God into the barn of his protection and provision.
items.contentSnippet: Come to God in prayer, to confess your sins, and to accept, as needy little farmyard chicks, the direction of God into the barn of his protection and provision.
items.creator: John Piper
items.dc:creator: John Piper

itunes.keywords: Desiring God, John Piper, Article, Pride & Humility, Psalm 32:9
itunes.subtitle: Come to God in prayer, to confess your sins, and to accept, as needy little farmyard chicks, the direction of God into the barn of his protection and provision.
itunes.summary: Come to God in prayer, to confess your sins, and to accept, as needy little farmyard chicks, the direction of God into the barn of his protection and provision.

items.title: Don’t Be Like the Mule

items.content: God delights in having his name known and honored. The first and most important prayer that can be prayed is, “Hallowed be your name.”
items.contentSnippet: God delights in having his name known and honored. The first and most important prayer that can be prayed is, “Hallowed be your name.”
items.creator: John Piper

itunes.summary: God delights in having his name known and honored. The first and most important prayer that can be prayed is, “Hallowed be your name.”

items.title: Pray for His Fame

items.content: Sheer sowing produces reaping. You must remember this, even when your tears tempt you to give up.
items.contentSnippet: Sheer sowing produces reaping. You must remember this, even when your tears tempt you to give up.
items.creator: John Piper
items.dc:creator: John Piper

itunes.keywords: Desiring God, John Piper, Article, Suffering, Psalm 126:5–6

itunes.summary: Sheer sowing produces reaping. You must remember this, even when your tears tempt you to give up.

items.title: Talk to Your Tears

items.content: Trust Christ, no matter what. Go with him, no matter where. You cannot lose in the end.
items.contentSnippet: Trust Christ, no matter what. Go with him, no matter where. You cannot lose in the end.
items.creator: John Piper
items.dc:creator: John Piper

itunes.keywords: Desiring God, John Piper, Article, The Resurrection of Christ, Matthew 27:65
itunes.subtitle: Trust Christ, no matter what. Go with him, no matter where. You cannot lose in the end.
itunes.summary: Trust Christ, no matter what. Go with him, no matter where. You cannot lose in the end.

items.title: You Cannot Lose in the End

items.content: When you are cast into the cellars of affliction, remember that the great King keeps his best wine there.
items.contentSnippet: When you are cast into the cellars of affliction, remember that the great King keeps his best wine there.

items.dc:creator: John Piper

items.title: The Great King’s Wine

items.content: The biblical criterion for misplaced shame and for well-placed shame is radically God-centered.

items.title: What Is Well-Placed Shame?

items.content: It is good not to talk very long about God without talking to God. Frequently interrupt your talking about God by talking to God.
items.contentSnippet: It is good not to talk very long about God without talking to God. Frequently interrupt your talking about God by talking to God.

items.dc:creator: John Piper

itunes.summary: It is good not to talk very long about God without talking to God. Frequently interrupt your talking about God by talking to God.

items.title: Talk to God, Not Just About Him

items.content: When Christ died and rose again, Satan was defeated. Jesus struck the decisive blow at Calvary.
items.contentSnippet: When Christ died and rose again, Satan was defeated. Jesus struck the decisive blow at Calvary.
items.creator: John Piper
items.dc:creator: John Piper

itunes.author: John Piper
itunes.keywords: Desiring God, John Piper, Article, Satan, James 4:7
itunes.subtitle: When Christ died and rose again, Satan was defeated. Jesus struck the decisive blow at Calvary.
itunes.summary: When Christ died and rose again, Satan was defeated. Jesus struck the decisive blow at Calvary.

items.title: Make Satan Know His Defeat

items.content: Don’t just do good things for your enemies. Desire their best, and express those desires in prayer, even when they’re nowhere around.
items.contentSnippet: Don’t just do good things for your enemies. Desire their best, and express those desires in prayer, even when they’re nowhere around.
items.creator: John Piper
items.dc:creator: John Piper

itunes.summary: Don’t just do good things for your enemies. Desire their best, and express those desires in prayer, even when they’re nowhere around.

items.title: What It Means to Pray for Your Enemy

items.content: Jesus is not just alive from the dead, but he is alive as the King who will reign forever — of his kingdom there will be no end.
items.contentSnippet: Jesus is not just alive from the dead, but he is alive as the King who will reign forever — of his kingdom there will be no end.
items.creator: John Piper
items.dc:creator: John Piper

itunes.keywords: Desiring God, John Piper, Article, The Person of Christ, 2 Timothy 2:8
itunes.subtitle: Jesus is not just alive from the dead, but he is alive as the King who will reign forever — of his kingdom there will be no end.
itunes.summary: Jesus is not just alive from the dead, but he is alive as the King who will reign forever — of his kingdom there will be no end.

items.title: Two Ways to Remember Jesus

items.content: Salvation is secured for all who are written in the book of life, not because of their deeds, but because Christ was slain for them.
items.contentSnippet: Salvation is secured for all who are written in the book of life, not because of their deeds, but because Christ was slain for them.
items.creator: John Piper
items.dc:creator: John Piper

itunes.summary: Salvation is secured for all who are written in the book of life, not because of their deeds, but because Christ was slain for them.

items.title: The Books at the Judgment

items.content: Sometimes God will strengthen your faith directly. But most of the time, he does so through another person.
items.contentSnippet: Sometimes God will strengthen your faith directly. But most of the time, he does so through another person.
items.creator: John Piper
items.dc:creator: John Piper

itunes.summary: Sometimes God will strengthen your faith directly. But most of the time, he does so through another person.

items.title: God Strengthens Us Through Others

items.content: O God, help us to feel worse about our own shortfalls than the failure of others.
items.contentSnippet: O God, help us to feel worse about our own shortfalls than the failure of others.
items.creator: John Piper
items.dc:creator: John Piper

itunes.author: John Piper
itunes.keywords: Desiring God, John Piper, Article, Indwelling Sin, Romans 7:19
itunes.subtitle: O God, help us to feel worse about our own shortfalls than the failure of others.
itunes.summary: O God, help us to feel worse about our own shortfalls than the failure of others.

items.title: How to Respond When You Falter

items.content: If you live inside the massive promise of Romans 8:28, your life is more solid and stable than Mount Everest.
items.contentSnippet: If you live inside the massive promise of Romans 8:28, your life is more solid and stable than Mount Everest.
items.creator: John Piper
items.dc:creator: John Piper

itunes.keywords: Desiring God, John Piper, Article, The Sovereignty of God, Romans 8:28

itunes.summary: If you live inside the massive promise of Romans 8:28, your life is more solid and stable than Mount Everest.

items.title: Better Than Everest

items.content: In the Father, you are under God’s care and protection. In the Son, you are under God’s charge and authority.
items.contentSnippet: In the Father, you are under God’s care and protection. In the Son, you are under God’s charge and authority.
items.creator: John Piper
items.dc:creator: John Piper

itunes.author: John Piper
itunes.keywords: Desiring God, John Piper, Article, The Sovereignty of God, 2 Thessalonians 1:1
itunes.subtitle: In the Father, you are under God’s care and protection. In the Son, you are under God’s charge and authority.
itunes.summary: In the Father, you are under God’s care and protection. In the Son, you are under God’s charge and authority.

items.title: Two of Our Deepest Needs

items.content: Only one thing satisfies the heart whose treasure is in heaven: doing the works of heaven. And heaven is a world of love!
items.contentSnippet: Only one thing satisfies the heart whose treasure is in heaven: doing the works of heaven. And heaven is a world of love!
items.creator: John Piper
items.dc:creator: John Piper

itunes.author: John Piper
itunes.keywords: Desiring God, John Piper, Article, Hope, Colossians 1:3–5
itunes.subtitle: Only one thing satisfies the heart whose treasure is in heaven: doing the works of heaven. And heaven is a world of love!
itunes.summary: Only one thing satisfies the heart whose treasure is in heaven: doing the works of heaven. And heaven is a world of love!

items.title: What Binds the Hands of Love?

items.content: Our perseverance doesn’t rest decisively on the reliability of our own resolve. It rests decisively on God’s work to keep us trusting him.
items.contentSnippet: Our perseverance doesn’t rest decisively on the reliability of our own resolve. It rests decisively on God’s work to keep us trusting him.
items.creator: John Piper
items.dc:creator: John Piper

itunes.author: John Piper
itunes.keywords: Desiring God, John Piper, Article, Perseverance of the Saints, 1 Corinthians 1:8–9
itunes.subtitle: Our perseverance doesn’t rest decisively on the reliability of our own resolve. It rests decisively on God’s work to keep us trusting him.
itunes.summary: Our perseverance doesn’t rest decisively on the reliability of our own resolve. It rests decisively on God’s work to keep us trusting him.

items.title: If He Calls, He Keeps

items.content: God will not spare any effort to give you all that Christ died to purchase — all things, all good, and all bad working for your good.
items.contentSnippet: God will not spare any effort to give you all that Christ died to purchase — all things, all good, and all bad working for your good.
items.creator: John Piper
items.dc:creator: John Piper

itunes.author: John Piper
itunes.keywords: Desiring God, John Piper, Article, The Sovereignty of God, Romans 8:32
itunes.subtitle: God will not spare any effort to give you all that Christ died to purchase — all things, all good, and all bad working for your good.
itunes.summary: God will not spare any effort to give you all that Christ died to purchase — all things, all good, and all bad working for your good.

items.title: As Sure as God’s Love for His Son

items.content: When others abandon you, strengthen your heart with God’s inexorable oath: “I will never leave you nor forsake you.”
items.contentSnippet: When others abandon you, strengthen your heart with God’s inexorable oath: “I will never leave you nor forsake you.”
items.creator: John Piper
items.dc:creator: John Piper

itunes.author: John Piper
itunes.keywords: Desiring God, John Piper, Article, Perseverance of the Saints, 2 Timothy 4:16–18
itunes.subtitle: When others abandon you, strengthen your heart with God’s inexorable oath: “I will never leave you nor forsake you.”
itunes.summary: When others abandon you, strengthen your heart with God’s inexorable oath: “I will never leave you nor forsake you.”

items.title: When Everyone Deserts You

items.content: Because Christ rose from the grave, God’s children are forgiven. No one can successfully bring a charge against those who are in Christ.
items.contentSnippet: Because Christ rose from the grave, God’s children are forgiven. No one can successfully bring a charge against those who are in Christ.
items.creator: John Piper
items.dc:creator: John Piper

itunes.author: John Piper
itunes.keywords: Desiring God, John Piper, Article, The Resurrection of Christ, 1 Corinthians 15:17
itunes.subtitle: Because Christ rose from the grave, God’s children are forgiven. No one can successfully bring a charge against those who are in Christ.
itunes.summary: Because Christ rose from the grave, God’s children are forgiven. No one can successfully bring a charge against those who are in Christ.

items.title: 10 Results of the Resurrection

items.content: Never reduce Christianity to a matter of demands and resolutions and willpower. It is a matter of what we love, what we delight in, what tastes good to us.
items.contentSnippet: Never reduce Christianity to a matter of demands and resolutions and willpower. It is a matter of what we love, what we delight in, what tastes good to us.
items.creator: John Piper
items.dc:creator: John Piper

itunes.author: John Piper
itunes.keywords: Desiring God, John Piper, Article, Prayer, The Bible, Psalm 119:103
itunes.subtitle: Never reduce Christianity to a matter of demands and resolutions and willpower. It is a matter of what we love, what we delight in, what tastes good to us.
itunes.summary: Never reduce Christianity to a matter of demands and resolutions and willpower. It is a matter of what we love, what we delight in, what tastes good to us.

items.title: How to Delight in God’s Word

items.content: When we trust Jesus, his presence and promise is so satisfying that we are not dominated by the alluring pleasures of sin.
items.contentSnippet: When we trust Jesus, his presence and promise is so satisfying that we are not dominated by the alluring pleasures of sin.
items.creator: John Piper
items.dc:creator: John Piper

itunes.author: John Piper
itunes.keywords: Desiring God, John Piper, Article, Faith, John 6:35
itunes.subtitle: When we trust Jesus, his presence and promise is so satisfying that we are not dominated by the alluring pleasures of sin.
itunes.summary: When we trust Jesus, his presence and promise is so satisfying that we are not dominated by the alluring pleasures of sin.

items.title: Forever Satisfied

items.content: Hear God say to you in all your troubles, “I will deliver you. You will triumph in the end. You will be more than a conqueror.”
items.contentSnippet: Hear God say to you in all your troubles, “I will deliver you. You will triumph in the end. You will be more than a conqueror.”
items.creator: John Piper
items.dc:creator: John Piper

itunes.author: John Piper
itunes.keywords: Desiring God, John Piper, Article, Fear & Anxiety, Ministry, Jeremiah 1:8
itunes.subtitle: Hear God say to you in all your troubles, “I will deliver you. You will triumph in the end. You will be more than a conqueror.”
itunes.summary: Hear God say to you in all your troubles, “I will deliver you. You will triumph in the end. You will be more than a conqueror.”

items.title: Ministry and the Fear of Man

items.content: Knowledge doesn’t guarantee godliness. But it seems that ignorance guarantees ungodliness. The power that leads to godliness is given through knowing God.
items.contentSnippet: Knowledge doesn’t guarantee godliness. But it seems that ignorance guarantees ungodliness. The power that leads to godliness is given through knowing God.
items.creator: John Piper
items.dc:creator: John Piper

itunes.author: John Piper
itunes.keywords: Desiring God, John Piper, Article, Life of the Mind, 2 Peter 1:3
itunes.subtitle: Knowledge doesn’t guarantee godliness. But it seems that ignorance guarantees ungodliness. The power that leads to godliness is given through knowing God.
itunes.summary: Knowledge doesn’t guarantee godliness. But it seems that ignorance guarantees ungodliness. The power that leads to godliness is given through knowing God.

items.title: Ignorance Guarantees Ungodliness

items.content: When temptations come, arm yourself with this thought: When my Lord suffered and died to free me from sin, I died to sin!
items.contentSnippet: When temptations come, arm yourself with this thought: When my Lord suffered and died to free me from sin, I died to sin!
items.creator: John Piper
items.dc:creator: John Piper

itunes.author: John Piper
itunes.keywords: Desiring God, John Piper, Article, Killing Sin, 1 Peter 4:1
itunes.subtitle: When temptations come, arm yourself with this thought: When my Lord suffered and died to free me from sin, I died to sin!
itunes.summary: When temptations come, arm yourself with this thought: When my Lord suffered and died to free me from sin, I died to sin!

items.title: Satan’s Candy Store

items.content: Whatever else gives way, whatever else disappoints, whatever else fails, God’s all-encompassing promise of future grace can never fail.
items.contentSnippet: Whatever else gives way, whatever else disappoints, whatever else fails, God’s all-encompassing promise of future grace can never fail.
items.creator: John Piper
items.dc:creator: John Piper

itunes.author: John Piper
itunes.keywords: Desiring God, John Piper, Article, The Death of Christ, Romans 8:32
itunes.subtitle: Whatever else gives way, whatever else disappoints, whatever else fails, God’s all-encompassing promise of future grace can never fail.
itunes.summary: Whatever else gives way, whatever else disappoints, whatever else fails, God’s all-encompassing promise of future grace can never fail.

items.title: God’s Best Promise

items.content: If there is any hope for eternity in the presence of God, we need a Redeemer, a Substitute, a Savior. Christ died and rose to be that hope.
items.contentSnippet: If there is any hope for eternity in the presence of God, we need a Redeemer, a Substitute, a Savior. Christ died and rose to be that hope.
items.creator: John Piper
items.dc:creator: John Piper

itunes.author: John Piper
itunes.keywords: Desiring God, John Piper, Article, The Death of Christ, Galatians 2:20
itunes.subtitle: If there is any hope for eternity in the presence of God, we need a Redeemer, a Substitute, a Savior. Christ died and rose to be that hope.
itunes.summary: If there is any hope for eternity in the presence of God, we need a Redeemer, a Substitute, a Savior. Christ died and rose to be that hope.

items.title: Jesus Died for This Moment

items.content: Good news! Eternal life is a free gift to all who will trust in Christ as Lord and Savior and supreme Treasure of their lives.
items.contentSnippet: Good news! Eternal life is a free gift to all who will trust in Christ as Lord and Savior and supreme Treasure of their lives.
items.creator: John Piper
items.dc:creator: John Piper

items.title: A Six-Point Summary of the Gospel

itunes.author: Desiring God
itunes.summary: Solid Joys is a daily devotional written and read by John Piper. These short and substantive readings will feed your joy in Jesus every day of the year. Discover more from Piper at desiringGod.org.

title: Solid Joys Daily Devotional
